scripts.build: vite build --config vite.popup.config.js && vite build --config vite.background.config.js && vite build --config vite.welcome.config.js && vite build --config vite.content_script.config.js && rsync -av output_background_script/* dist && rsync -av output_popup/* dist && rsync -av output_welcome/* dist && rsync -av output_content_script/* dist && rm dist/index.html && rm -f dist.zip && zip -vr dist.zip dist
scripts.build:all: npm run build:chromium && npm run build:firefox && npm run zip:all
scripts.build:chromium: npm run build --mode chromium && node scripts/build.js
scripts.build:firefox: npm run build --mode firefox && node scripts/build.js
